recipesJson.name: Fizzy cola candy
recipesJson.author: ITALIAN-VAPE
recipesJson.description:
This recipe is a return to childhood and those Haribo's Fizzy Cola Candy we had.
Cap jelly candy 4% and TPA Sour 3% together to give that jelly sinthetic gummy flavour.
Fa lemon sicily help sour to be more vivid.
Fa cola pleasure is the exact cola taste of those candies of my childhood, 2% is the right amount.
I know Cap super sweet at 0.75 may be scary, but guys these are candies from the 80's, not healty surrogate of the new millenium, you know what I mean!

reviews.text:
Made a second batch of this Today, It tastes EXACTLY like the Haribo candies in the Picture (well at least like the ones we have here in SA).
I only had "(FA) Dr Who?" available instead of (FA) USA Pleasure, So I replaced with Dr Who @ 6% and its Awesome!!! The only pity is that Dr Who is longer stocked here anymore. Tasty Candy Mix, Thanks!
Made this the other day. I was too impatient to wait. Tried it today & it's really good. Will definitely make more, thanks..
